item.title: Build and install
item.description: Build and install Launching the follow command go will take care of the downloading, the dependency resolving, the building and finally of the installation of the binary in the $GOBIN directory. go get -u github.com/Matrix86/driplane/…

item.title: Docker
item.description: Docker driplane is containerized using a really lightweight Linux distribution called Alpine Linux. To pull the latest image version: docker pull matrix86/driplane To run it: docker run –rm -v config:/app/config -it matrix86/driplane:latest -config config/config.yaml where the config directory contains the config.yaml file, the rule directory, the js directory and the templates directory.
